General Argument Name Convention

gen_args.Rd

General Argument Name Convention

gen_args(
  armvar,
  lbl_overall,
  prune_0,
  deco,
  .study,
  ad_bl,
  adsl,
  adeg,
  adae,
  adcm,
  admh,
  aag,
  advs,
  adlb,
  adex,
  adsub,
  adrs,
  adtte,
  adhy,
  adsaftte,
  addv,
  adcssrs,
  adqlqc,
  acg,
  adic,
  group
)

Arguments

armvar

(character) variable used for column splitting
lbl_overall

(character) label used for overall column, if set to NULL the overall column is omitted
prune_0

(logical) remove 0 count rows
deco

(character) decoration with title, subtitles and main_footer content
.study

(list) with default values for the arguments of the function
ad_bl

(data.frame) subject baseline Dataset with one row per patient
adsl

(data.frame) Subject Level Analysis Dataset
adeg

(data.frame) ECG Analysis Dataset
adae

(data.frame) Adverse Events Analysis Dataset
adcm

(data.frame) Concomitant Medications Analysis Dataset
admh

(data.frame) Medical History Analysis Dataset
aag

(data.frame) Adverse Event Grouping Defs Dataset
advs

(data.frame) Vital Signs Analysis Dataset
adlb

(data.frame) Laboratory Analysis Dataset
adex

(data.frame) Exposure Analysis Dataset
adsub

(data.frame) Subcategory Analysis Dataset
adrs

(data.frame) Response Analysis Dataset
adtte

(data.frame) Time to Event Analysis Dataset
adhy

(data.frame) Hy's Law Analysis Dataset
adsaftte

(data.frame) Safety Time to Event Analysis Dataset
addv

(data.frame) Protocol Deviations Analysis Dataset
adcssrs

(data.frame) C-SSRS Analysis Dataset
adqlqc

(data.frame) EORTC QLQ-C30 V3 Analysis Dataset
acg

(data.frame) Concomitant Med. Grouping Defs Dataset
adic

(data.frame) Interval Censoring Analysis Dataset
group

nest list for group-dependent data binning

Details

the following arguments are better provided through the study object:

  • lbl_overall

  • armvar
